name: Updog (itch) (Moonflower Games)
description:
Updog is a fast-paced 3D platforming game about reaching the heavens on a homemade raft, or as close to them as you can get. Collect crates to power your raft and balloons to balance it, all while learning the advanced movement the game has to offer.

Find rare golden doors to get access to challenge rooms where you can put your movement to its test and earn unique rewards. As the raft gets higher the challenge increases, can you keep your dog going up?
